h4.p: [03] 656^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^P4.0211^ea^ ^a^M0.0273^ea^ ^a^V0.0284^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saa.lho migaaranattaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa vihaara.m kattukaamo hoti. atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, ayye, bhikkhunisa"nghassa vihaara.m kaatu.m. detha me navakammika.m bhikkhuni''nti. tena kho pana samayena catasso bhaginiyo bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa honti -- nandaa, nandavatii, sundariinandaa, thullanandaati. taasu sundariinandaa bhikkhunii taru.napabbajitaa abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa pa.n.ditaa byattaa medhaavinii dakkhaa analasaa, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagataa, ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. atha kho bhikkhunisa"ngho sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m sammannitvaa saa.lhassa migaaranattuno navakammika.m adaasi. tena kho pana samayena sundariinandaa bhikkhunii saa.lhassa ^a^V0.0285^ea^ migaaranattuno nivesana.m abhikkha.na.m gacchati -- ``vaasi.m detha, parasu.m {pharasu.m (syaa0 ka0)} detha, ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (ka0)} detha, kuddaala.m detha, nikhaadana.m dethaa''ti. saa.lhopi migaaranattaa bhikkhunupassaya.m abhikkha.na.m ^a^T0.0002^ea^ gacchati kataakata.m jaanitu.m. te abhi.nhadassanena pa.tibaddhacittaa ahesu.m.

[03]atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m duusetu.m okaasa.m alabhamaano etadevatthaaya bhikkhunisa"nghassa bhatta.m akaasi. atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa bhattagge aasana.m pa~n~napento -- ``ettakaa bhikkhuniyo ayyaaya sundariinandaaya vu.d.dhataraa''ti ekamanta.m aasana.m pa~n~napesi ``ettakaa navakataraa''ti -- ekamanta.m aasana.m pa~n~napesi. pa.ticchanne okaase ^a^M0.0274^ea^ nikuu.te sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa ^a^P4.0212^ea^ aasana.m pa~n~napesi, yathaa theraa bhikkhuniyo jaaneyyu.m -- ``navakaana.m bhikkhuniina.m santike nisinnaa''ti; navakaapi bhikkhuniyo jaaneyyu.m -- ``theraana.m bhikkhuniina.m santike nisinnaa''ti. atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, ayye, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. sundariinandaa bhikkhunii sallakkhetvaa -- ``na bahukato saa.lho migaaranattaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa bhatta.m akaasi; ma.m so duusetukaamo. sacaaha.m gamissaami vissaro me bhavissatii''ti, antevaasini.m bhikkhuni.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha me pi.n.dapaata.m niihara. yo ce ma.m pucchati, `gilaanaa'ti pa.tivedehii''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho saa bhikkhunii sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa paccassosi.

[03]tena kho pana samayena saa.lho migaaranattaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito hoti sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m pa.tipucchanto -- ``kaha.m, ayye, ayyaa sundariinandaa? kaha.m, ayye, ayyaa sundariinandaa''ti? eva.m ^a^T0.0003^ea^ vutte sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa antevaasinii bhikkhunii saa.lha.m migaaranattaara.m etadavoca -- ``gilaanaavuso; pi.n.dapaata.m niiharissaamii''ti. atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa -- ``yampaaha.m atthaaya {ya.mpaaha.m (syaa0)} bhikkhunisa"nghassa bhatta.m akaasi.m ayyaaya sundariinandaaya kaara.naa''ti manusse aa.naapetvaa -- ``bhikkhunisa"ngha.m bhattena parivisathaa''ti vatvaa yena bhikkhunupassayo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena sundariinandaa bhikkhunii bahaaraamako.t.thake .thitaa hoti saa.lha.m migaaranattaara.m patimaanentii. addasaa kho sundariinandaa bhikkhunii saa.lha.m migaaranattaara.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana upassaya.m pavisitvaa sasiisa.m paarupitvaa ma~ncake nipajji. atha kho saa.lho migaaranattaa yena sundariinandaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m te, ayye, aphaasu, kissa nipannaasii''ti? ``eva~nheta.m, aavuso, hoti yaa anicchanta.m icchatii''ti. ``kyaaha.m ta.m, ayye ^a^V0.0286^ea^, na icchissaami? api caaha.m okaasa.m na labhaami ta.m duusetu''nti. avassuto avassutaaya sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajji.

[03]tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii jaraadubbalaa cara.nagilaanaa sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa aviduure nipannaa hoti. addasaa kho saa bhikkhunii ^a^M0.0275^ea^ saa.lha.m migaaranattaara.m avassuta.m avassutaaya sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa kaayasa.msagga.m ^a^T0.0004^ea^ samaapajjanta.m. disvaana ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa sundariinandaa avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyissatii''ti ^a^P4.0213^ea^! atha kho saa bhikkhunii bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesi. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa santu.t.thaa lajjiniyo kukkuccikaa sikkhaakaamaa taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa sundariinandaa avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyissatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa santu.t.thaa lajjino kukkuccakaa sikkhaakaamaa te ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyissatii''ti!

[03]atha kho te bhikkhuu sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyatii''ti {saadiyiiti (ka0)}? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa -- ``ananucchavika.m, bhikkhave, sundariinandaaya bhikkhuniyaa ananulomika.m appatiruupa.m assaama.naka.m akappiya.m akara.niiya.m. katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, sundariinandaa bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyissati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya pasannaana.m vaa bhiyyobhaavaaya. atha khveta.m, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0005^ea^, appasannaana~nceva appasaadaaya pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathattaayaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa sundariinanda.m bhikkhuni.m anekapariyaayena vigarahitvaa dubbharataaya dupposataaya mahicchataaya asantu.t.thitaaya {asantu.t.thataaya (syaa0), asantu.t.thiyaa (ka0)} sa"nga.nikaaya kosajjassa ava.n.na.m bhaasitvaa, anekapariyaayena subharataaya suposataaya appicchassa santu.t.thassa {santu.t.thiyaa (ka0)} sallekhassa dhutassa paasaadikassa apacayassa viiriyaarambhassa va.n.na.m bhaasitvaa, bhikkhuuna.m tadanucchavika.m tadanulomika.m dhammi.m katha.m katvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaami dasa atthavase ^a^V0.0287^ea^ pa.ticca -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m niggahaaya ^a^M0.0276^ea^, pesalaana.m bhikkhuniina.m phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa vinayaanuggahaaya. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --

[03] 657^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m aamasana.m vaa paraamasana.m vaa gaha.na.m vaa chupana.m vaa pa.tipii.lana.m vaa saadiyeyya, ayampi paaraajikaa hoti asa.mvaasaa ubbhajaa.numa.n.dalikaa''^eb^ti.

[03] 658^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaa^eb^ ^a^P4.0214^ea^ ^b^panaa^eb^ti yaa yaadisaa yathaayuttaa yathaajaccaa yathaanaamaa yathaagottaa yathaasiilaa yathaavihaarinii yathaagocaraa theraa vaa navaa vaa majjhimaa vaa, esaa vuccati yaa panaati.

[03]^b^bhikkhunii^eb^ti bhikkhikaati bhikkhunii; bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagataati bhikkhunii; bhinnapa.tadharaati bhikkhunii ^a^T0.0006^ea^; sama~n~naaya bhikkhunii; pa.ti~n~naaya bhikkhunii; ehi bhikkhuniiti bhikkhunii; tiihi sara.nagamanehi upasampannaati bhikkhunii; bhadraa bhikkhunii; saaraa bhikkhunii; sekhaa bhikkhunii; asekhaa bhikkhunii; samaggena ubhatosa"nghena ~natticatutthena kammena akuppena .thaanaarahena upasampannaati bhikkhunii. tatra yaaya.m bhikkhunii samaggena ubhatosa"nghena ~natticatutthena kammena akuppena .thaanaarahena upasampannaa, aya.m imasmi.m atthe adhippetaa bhikkhuniiti.
[03]^b^avassutaa^eb^ naama saarattaa apekkhavatii pa.tibaddhacittaa.
[03]^b^avassuto^eb^ naama saaratto apekkhavaa pa.tibaddhacitto.
[03]^b^purisapuggalo^eb^ naama manussapuriso na yakkho na peto na tiracchaanagato vi~n~nuu pa.tibalo kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjitu.m.
[03]^b^adhakkhaka^eb^nti he.t.thakkhaka.m.
[03]^b^ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala^eb^nti uparijaa.numa.n.dala.m.
[03]^b^aamasana.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0288^ea^ naama aama.t.thamatta.m.
[03]^b^paraamasana.m^eb^ naama itocito ca sa~ncopana.m.
[03]^b^gaha.na.m^eb^ naama gahitamatta.m.
[03]^b^chupana.m^eb^ naama phu.t.thamatta.m.
[03]^b^pa.tipii.lana.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0277^ea^ ^b^vaa saadiyeyyaa^eb^ti a"nga.m gahetvaa nippii.lana.m saadiyati.
[03]^b^ayampii^eb^ti purimaayo upaadaaya vuccati.

[03]^b^paaraajikaa hotii^eb^ti seyyathaapi naama puriso siisacchinno abhabbo tena sariirabandhanena jiivitu.m, evameva bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhaka.m ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala.m ^a^T0.0007^ea^ aamasana.m vaa paraamasana.m vaa gaha.na.m vaa chupana.m vaa pa.tipii.lana.m vaa saadiyantii assama.nii hoti asakyadhiitaa. tena vuccati paaraajikaa hotiiti.
[03]^b^asa.mvaasaa^eb^ti ^b^sa.mvaaso^eb^ naama ekakamma.m ekuddeso samasikkhataa, eso sa.mvaaso naama. so taaya saddhi.m natthi, tena vuccati asa.mvaasaati.

[03] 664^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0011^ea^ ^a^P4.0216^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sundariinandaa bhikkhunii saa.lhena migaaranattunaa gabbhinii hoti ^a^V0.0291^ea^. yaava gabbho taru.no ahosi taava chaadesi. paripakke gabbhe vibbhamitvaa vijaayi. bhikkhuniyo thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m etadavocu.m -- ``sundariinandaa kho, ayye, aciravibbhantaa vijaataa. kacci no saa bhikkhuniiyeva samaanaa gabbhinii''ti? ``eva.m, ayye''ti. ``kissa pana tva.m, ayye, jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodesi na ga.nassa aarocesii''ti? ``yo etissaa ava.n.no mayheso ava.n.no, yaa etissaa akitti mayhesaa akitti, yo etissaa ayaso mayheso ayaso, yo etissaa alaabho mayheso ^a^M0.0280^ea^ alaabho. kyaaha.m, ayye, attano ava.n.na.m attano akitti.m attano ayasa.m attano alaabha.m paresa.m aarocessaamii''ti? yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa thullanandaa jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodessati na ga.nassa aarocessatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu {ye te bhikkhuu...pe0... (?)} bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa etasmi.m nidaane etasmi.m pakara.ne bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaataapetvaa ^a^T0.0012^ea^ bhikkhuu pa.tipucchi -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodeti {pa.ticodesi... aarocesiiti (ka0)} na ga.nassa aarocetii''ti {pa.ticodesi... aarocesiiti (ka0)}? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodessati na ga.nassa aarocessati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --

[03] 665^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii jaana.m paaraajika.m dhamma.m ajjhaapanna.m bhikkhuni.m nevattanaa pa.ticodeyya na ga.nassa aaroceyya, yadaa ca saa .thitaa vaa assa cutaa vaa naasitaa vaa avassa.taa vaa, saa pacchaa eva.m vadeyya -- `pubbevaaha.m, ayye, a~n~naasi.m eta.m bhikkhuni.m evaruupaa ca evaruupaa ca saa bhaginiiti^eb^ ^a^P4.0217^ea^, ^b^no ca kho attanaa pa.ticodessa.m na ga.nassa aarocessa'nti, ayampi paaraajikaa hoti asa.mvaasaa vajjappa.ticchaadikaa^eb^''ti.

[03]^b^bhikkhuniihii^eb^ti a~n~naahi bhikkhuniihi. yaa passanti yaa su.nanti taahi vattabbaa -- ``eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena anaadaro appa.tikaaro akatasahaayo. maayye, eta.m bhikkhu.m ^a^T0.0017^ea^ anuvattii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbaa. tatiyampi vattabbaa. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. sutvaa na vadanti, aapatti dukka.tassa. saa bhikkhunii sa"nghamajjhampi aaka.d.dhitvaa vattabbaa -- ``eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena sa"nghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena anaadaro appa.tikaaro akatasahaayo. maayye, eta.m bhikkhu.m anuvattii''ti. dutiyampi vattabbaa. tatiyampi vattabbaa. sace pa.tinissajjati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce pa.tinissajjati, aapatti dukka.tassa. saa bhikkhunii samanubhaasitabbaa. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, samanubhaasitabbaa. byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --

[03] 675^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii avassutaa avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggaha.na.m vaa saadiyeyya, sa"nghaa.tika.n.naggaha.na.m vaa saadiyeyya, santi.t.theyya vaa, sallapeyya vaa, sa"nketa.m vaa^eb^ ^a^P4.0221^ea^ ^b^gaccheyya^eb^ ^a^V0.0297^ea^, ^b^purisassa vaa abbhaagamana.m saadiyeyya, channa.m vaa anupaviseyya, kaaya.m vaa tadatthaaya upasa.mhareyya etassa asaddhammassa pa.tisevanatthaaya, ayampi paaraajikaa hoti asa.mvaasaa a.t.thavatthukaa''^eb^ti.

[03] 678^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T0.0023^ea^ ^a^P4.0223^ea^ ^a^M0.0288^ea^ ^a^V0.0299^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro upaasako bhikkhunisa"nghassa udosita.m {uddosita.m (sii0 syaa0)} datvaa kaala"nkato hoti. tassa dve puttaa honti -- eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno. te pettika.m saapateyya.m vibhaji.msu. atha kho so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m etadavoca -- ``amhaaka.m udosito, ta.m bhaajemaa''ti. eva.m vutte so saddho pasanno ta.m assaddha.m appasanna.m etadavoca -- ``maayyo, eva.m avaca. amhaaka.m pitunaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa dinno''ti. dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m etadavoca -- ``amhaaka.m udosito, ta.m bhaajemaa''ti. atha kho so saddho pasanno ta.m assaddha.m appasanna.m etadavoca -- ``maayyo, eva.m avaca. amhaaka.m pitunaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa dinno''ti. tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m etadavoca -- ``amhaaka.m udosito, ta.m bhaajemaa''ti. atha kho so saddho pasanno -- ``sace mayha.m ^a^T0.0024^ea^ bhavissati, ahampi bhikkhunisa"nghassa dassaamii''ti -- ta.m assaddha.m appasanna.m etadavoca -- ``bhaajemaa''ti. atha kho so udosito tehi bhaajiiyamaano tassa assaddhassa appasannassa paapu.naati {paapu.ni (syaa0)}. atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- ``nikkhamathaayye, amhaaka.m udosito''ti.

[03]eva.m ^a^V0.0300^ea^ vutte thullanandaa bhikkhunii ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- ``maayyo, eva.m avaca, tumhaaka.m pitunaa bhikkhunisa"nghassa dinno''ti. ``dinno na dinno''ti vohaarike mahaamatte pucchi.msu. mahaamattaa evamaaha.msu -- ``ko, ayye, jaanaati bhikkhunisa"nghassa dinno''ti? eva.m vutte thullanandaa bhikkhunii te mahaamatte etadavoca ^a^P4.0224^ea^ -- ``api naayyo {api nvayyaa (syaa0), api naayyo (ka0)} tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa sakkhi.m .thapayitvaa daana.m diyyamaana''nti ^a^M0.0289^ea^? atha kho te mahaamattaa -- ``sacca.m kho ayyaa aahaa''ti ta.m udosita.m bhikkhunisa"nghassa aka.msu. atha kho so puriso paraajito ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti -- ``assama.niyo imaa mu.n.daa bandhakiniyo. katha~nhi naama amhaaka.m udosita.m acchindaapessantii''ti! thullanandaa bhikkhunii mahaamattaana.m etamattha.m aarocesi. mahaamattaa ta.m purisa.m da.n.daapesu.m. atha kho so puriso da.n.dito bhikkhunuupassayassa aviduure aajiivakaseyya.m kaaraapetvaa aajiivake uyyojesi -- ``etaa bhikkhuniyo accaavadathaa''ti.

[03]thullanandaa bhikkhunii mahaamattaana.m etamattha.m aarocesi. mahaamattaa ta.m purisa.m bandhaapesu.m. manussaa ujjhaayanti ^a^T0.0025^ea^ khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``pa.thama.m bhikkhuniyo udosita.m acchindaapesu.m, dutiya.m da.n.daapesu.m, tatiya.m bandhaapesu.m. idaani ghaataapessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuniyo tesa.m manussaana.m ujjhaayantaana.m khiyyantaana.m vipaacentaana.m. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa thullanandaa ussayavaadikaa viharissatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii ussayavaadikaa viharatiiti. ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii ussayavaadikaa viharissati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --

[03] 679^b^.^eb^ ^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii ussayavaadikaa vihareyya gahapatinaa vaa gahapatiputtena vaa daasena vaa kammakaarena {kammakarena (sii0 syaa0)} vaa antamaso sama.naparibbaajakenaapi, aya.m bhikkhunii pa.thamaapattika.m dhamma.m aapannaa nissaara.niiya.m sa"nghaadisesa''^eb^nti.

[03] 682^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0302^ea^ samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena vesaaliya.m a~n~natarassa licchavissa pajaapati aticaarinii hoti. atha kho so licchavi ^a^T0.0027^ea^ ta.m itthi.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu viramaahi, anattha.m kho te karissaamii''ti. evampi saa vuccamaanaa naadiyi. tena kho pana samayena vesaaliya.m licchaviga.no sannipatito hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho so licchavi te licchavayo etadavoca -- ``eka.m me, ayyo ^a^M0.0291^ea^, itthi.m anujaanaathaa''ti. ``kaa naama saa''ti? ``mayha.m pajaapati aticarati, ta.m ghaatessaamii''ti. ``jaanaahii''ti. assosi kho saa itthii -- ``saamiko kira ma.m ghaatetukaamo''ti. varabha.n.da.m aadaaya saavatthi.m gantvaa titthiye upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. titthiyaa na icchi.msu pabbaajetu.m. bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. bhikkhuniyopi na icchi.msu pabbaajetu.m. thullananda.m bhikkhuni.m upasa"nkamitvaa bha.n.daka.m dassetvaa pabbajja.m yaaci. thullanandaa bhikkhunii bha.n.daka.m gahetvaa pabbaajesi.

[03]atha kho so licchavi ta.m itthi.m gavesanto saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuniisu pabbajita.m disvaana yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P4.0226^ea^ raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``pajaapati me, deva, varabha.n.da.m aadaaya saavatthi.m anuppattaa. ta.m devo anujaanaatuu''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne, vicinitvaa aacikkhaa''ti. ``di.t.thaa, deva, bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa''ti. ``sace, bha.ne, bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa, na saa labbhaa ki~nci kaatu.m. svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, caratu brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. atha kho so licchavi ujjhaayati khiyyati vipaaceti ^a^T0.0028^ea^ -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhuniyo cori.m pabbaajessantii''ti! assosu.m kho bhikkhuniyo tassa licchavissa ujjhaayantassa khiyyantassa vipaacentassa. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama ayyaa thullanandaa cori.m pabbaajessatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii cori.m pabbaajetiiti {pabbaajesiiti (ka0)}? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, thullanandaa bhikkhunii cori.m pabbaajessati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --

[03] 687^b^.^eb^ tena samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhaddaaya kaapilaaniyaa antevaasinii bhikkhunii bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m bha.n.ditvaa gaamaka.m {gaamake (syaa0)} ~naatikula.m agamaasi. bhaddaa kaapilaanii ta.m bhikkhuni.m apassantii bhikkhuniyo pucchi -- ``kaha.m itthannaamaa, na dissatii''ti! ``bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m, ayye, bha.n.ditvaa na dissatii''ti. ``ammaa, amukasmi.m gaamake etissaa ~naatikula.m. tattha gantvaa vicinathaa''ti. bhikkhuniyo tattha gantvaa ta.m bhikkhuni.m passitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, ayye ^a^V0.0305^ea^, ekikaa aagataa, kaccisi appadha.msitaa''ti? ``appadha.msitaamhi, ayye''ti. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhunii ekaa gaamantara.m gacchissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii ekaa gaamantara.m gacchatiiti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi ^a^T0.0031^ea^ buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0228^ea^, bhikkhunii ekaa gaamantara.m gacchissati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii ekaa gaamantara.m gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunii pa.thamaapattika.m dhamma.m aapannaa nissaara.niiya.m sa"nghaadisesa''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 688^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M0.0294^ea^ kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo saaketaa saavatthi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipannaa honti. antaraamagge nadii taritabbaa hoti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo naavike upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``saadhu no, aavuso, taarethaa''ti. ``naayye, sakkaa ubho saki.m taaretu''nti. eko eka.m uttaaresi. utti.n.no utti.n.na.m duusesi. anutti.n.no anutti.n.na.m duusesi. taa pacchaa samaagantvaa pucchi.msu -- ``kaccisi, ayye, appadha.msitaa''ti? ``padha.msitaamhi, ayye! tva.m pana, ayye, appadha.msitaa''ti? ``padha.msitaamhi, ayye''ti. atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo saavatthi.m gantvaa bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhunii ekaa nadiipaara.m gacchissatii''ti! atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuuna.m etamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhikkhuu bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii ekaa nadiipaara.m gacchatii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii ekaa nadiipaara.m gacchissati! neta.m ^a^T0.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --
[03]^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii ekaa vaa gaamantara.m gaccheyya, ekaa vaa nadiipaara.m gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunii pa.thamaapattika.m dhamma.m aapannaa nissaara.niiya.m sa"nghaadisesa''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03] 689^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V0.0306^ea^ kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade saavatthi.m gacchantaa {gantvaa (ka0)} saaya.m a~n~natara.m gaama.m upagacchi.msu. tattha a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii abhiruupaa hoti dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa. a~n~nataro puriso tassaa bhikkhuniyaa saha dassanena pa.tibaddhacitto hoti. atha kho so puriso taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m seyya.m pa~n~napento tassaa bhikkhuniyaa seyya.m ^a^P4.0229^ea^ ekamanta.m pa~n~naapesi. atha kho saa bhikkhunii sallakkhetvaa -- ``pariyu.t.thito aya.m puriso; sace ratti.m aagacchissati, vissaro me bhavissatii''ti, bhikkhuniyo anaapucchaa a~n~natara.m kula.m gantvaa seyya.m kappesi. atha kho so puriso ratti.m ^a^M0.0295^ea^ aagantvaa ta.m bhikkhuni.m gavesanto bhikkhuniyo gha.t.tesi. bhikkhuniyo ta.m bhikkhuni.m apassantiyo evamaaha.msu -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho saa bhikkhunii purisena saddhi.m nikkhantaa''ti.

[03]atha kho saa bhikkhunii tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena taa bhikkhuniyo tenupasa"nkami. bhikkhuniyo ta.m bhikkhuni.m etadavocu.m -- ``kissa tva.m, ayye, purisena saddhi.m nikkhantaa''ti? ``naaha.m, ayye, purisena saddhi.m nikkhantaa''ti. bhikkhuniina.m etamattha.m ^a^T0.0033^ea^ aarocesi. yaa taa bhikkhuniyo appicchaa...pe0... taa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- ``katha~nhi naama bhikkhunii ekaa ratti.m vippavasissatii''ti...pe0... sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii ekaa ratti.m vippavasiiti {vippavasiiti (ka0)}? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. vigarahi buddho bhagavaa...pe0... katha~nhi naama, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii ekaa ratti.m vippavasissati! neta.m, bhikkhave, appasannaana.m vaa pasaadaaya...pe0... eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --

[03]^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii ekaa vaa gaamantara.m gaccheyya, ekaa vaa nadiipaara.m gaccheyya, ekaa vaa ratti.m vippavaseyya, ayampi bhikkhunii pa.thamaapattika.m dhamma.m aapannaa nissaara.niiya.m sa"nghaadisesa''^eb^nti.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03]^b^``yaa pana bhikkhunii santa.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa aaraama.m paviseyya, paacittiya''^eb^nti.

[03]^b^``na udake uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karissaamiiti sikkhaa kara.niiyaa''^eb^ti ^a^T0.0266^ea^.
[03]eva~ncida.m bhagavataa bhikkhuniina.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m hoti.

[03]tena kho pana samayena gilaanaa bhikkhuniyo udake uccaarampi passaavampi khe.lampi kaatu.m kukkuccaayanti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m...pe0... anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gilaanaaya bhikkhuniyaa udake uccaarampi passaavampi khe.lampi kaatu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ima.m sikkhaapada.m uddisantu --
[03]^b^``na udake agilaanaa uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karissaamiiti sikkhaa kara.niiyaa''^eb^ti.
[03]na ^a^V0.0487^ea^ udake agilaanaaya uccaaro vaa passaavo vaa khe.lo vaa kaatabbo. yaa anaadariya.m pa.ticca udake agilaanaa uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa khe.la.m vaa karoti, aapatti dukka.tassa.
[03]anaapatti asa~ncicca, assatiyaa, ajaanantiyaa, gilaanaaya, thale kato udaka.m ottharati, aapadaasu, ummattikaaya, khittacittaaya, vedanaa.t.taaya, aadikammikaayaati.
[06] pannarasamasikkhaapada.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] paadukavaggo sattamo.

[03]uddi.t.thaa ^a^M0.0470^ea^ kho, ayyaayo, sekhiyaa dhammaa. tatthaayyaayo pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? dutiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? tatiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? parisuddhetthaayyaayo, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.
[06] sekhiyaka.n.da.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] ime kho panaayyaayo satta adhikara.nasamathaa
[06] dhammaa uddesa.m aagacchanti.

[03] 1242^b^.^eb^ uppannuppannaana.m ^a^T0.0267^ea^ ^a^P4.0351^ea^ ^a^V0.0488^ea^ adhikara.naana.m samathaaya vuupasamaaya sammukhaavinayo daatabbo, sativinayo daatabbo, amuu.lhavinayo daatabbo, pa.ti~n~naaya kaaretabba.m, yebhuyyasikaa, tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarakoti.

[03]uddi.t.thaa kho, ayyaayo, satta adhikara.nasamathaa dhammaa. tatthaayyaayo pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? dutiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? tatiyampi pucchaami -- ``kaccittha parisuddhaa''? parisuddhetthaayyaayo, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamiiti.
[06] adhikara.nasamathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]uddi.t.tha.m kho, ayyaayo, nidaana.m. uddi.t.thaa a.t.tha paaraajikaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa sattarasa sa"nghaadisesaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa ti.msa nissaggiyaa paacittiyaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa chasa.t.thisataa paacittiyaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa a.t.tha paa.tidesaniiyaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa sekhiyaa dhammaa. uddi.t.thaa satta adhikara.nasamathaa dhammaa. ettaka.m tassa bhagavato suttaagata.m suttapariyaapanna.m anvaddhamaasa.m uddesa.m aagacchati. tattha sabbaaheva samaggaahi sammodamaanaahi avivadamaanaahi sikkhitabbanti.
[06] bhikkhunivibha"ngo ni.t.thito.
[06] paacittiyapaa.li ni.t.thitaa.
